title: Black Man White Man
description: BLACK MAN WHITE MAN is a controversial story about a modern-day police detective who goes to sleep at night and unknowingly transforms into a white serial killer. When the detective wakes up in the morning, he has to catch the killer. A modern-day Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde? Or something more, something deeper, something that has a little bit of each of us in the story? Combining mystery and suspense in today’s real world of social and racial issues, the novel tells a compelling story that will evoke a myriad of emotions in every reader–emotions that many can relate to in today’s diverse and divided world; emotions that can surface depressed issues and stir the soul and sometimes heal the heart.
author: Nathan Squiers
